text: is an American actor, musician, singer and writer. Lennon was born on October 9, 1975 at New York Hospital in New York City, He is the son of John Lennon and his second wife Yoko Ono. He is Japanese on his mother's side and English, Welsh and Irish on his father's side. This makes him Eurasian. He has the same birthday as his father. Lennon is currently dating model/musician Charlotte Muel. Lennon had been engaged to musican Bijou Phillips. ==Groups involved in== Lennon has worked with Mark Ronson and childhood friend Jordan Galland.www.filmmakermagazine.com He has been a member of the groups Cibo Matto, Ghost of a Saber Toothed Tiger and Dopo Yume. ==Filmography== Year Title Comments 2006 Friendly Fire Writer/Actor 2007 Rozencrantz and Guildenstern are Undead directed by Jordan Galland Contributed music score 2008 Coin Locker Babies Writer/Director == References == Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American rock guitarists Category:John Lennon Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state) Category:Singers from New York City
title: Sean Lennon
